name: Drag & Clic
description:
Drag & Clic

Is a Puzzle game that utilizes the mouse pointer or "Clic", with the companionship of Drag trying to escape the castle and the only way to do that is to click on Drag in the right direction and many other stuff in the game. you will feel anger, love but more importantly RAGE!!!, so i hope you really in joy this game an also the music.  

 Its our first demo to release, this game is still in development with many years behind it. Even thought this game is a demo we will be adding to it, also getting feed back  from the community "if we get any" but we will do our best to make this game Challenging. Ever step of the way.
